airplane.typical_scale: medium to large, often spans most of frame
airplane.typical_shape_and_parts: Long fuselage with two wings and a tail section; smooth, aerodynamic body.
airplane.typical_colors_and_texture: white, silver, gray, smooth metal surface
airplane.common_viewpoints: side view or angled front view
airplane.motion_or_pose_cues: flying with wings extended or on runway
distinctive_features_to_disambiguate: appears in sky or on tarmac

confusable_with.ship: similar elongated body but appears on water

confusable_with.automobile: elongated body, confusion when viewed from side on ground

airplane.one_line_caption: A flying aircraft with wings and a smooth metallic body.

automobile.typical_shape_and_parts: Rectangular body with four wheels, windows, and headlights.
automobile.typical_colors_and_texture: varied solid colors, smooth metal and glass surfaces

confusable_with.truck: both have wheels, differ in size and cargo area

confusable_with.ship: elongated shape may confuse low-resolution images

automobile.one_line_caption: A four-wheeled vehicle on a road or parking area.

bird.typical_shape_and_parts: Compact body with wings, beak, and tail; two small legs.
bird.typical_colors_and_texture: feathers, brown, gray, or bright colors
bird.common_viewpoints: side or angled view, sometimes top-down
bird.motion_or_pose_cues: flying with wings open or perched on branch
distinctive_features_to_disambiguate: no fur or limbs like mammals

confusable_with.airplane: both seen in sky with spread wings

confusable_with.cat: small body confusion at low resolution

bird.one_line_caption: A small feathered animal with wings and a pointed beak.

cat.typical_scale: medium, often fills much of frame
cat.typical_shape_and_parts: Rounded head, pointed ears, four legs, long tail.
cat.typical_colors_and_texture: fur in gray, brown, black, or white, soft texture
cat.common_viewpoints: side or front view, often crouched or sitting

confusable_with.dog: similar body size and fur, different face shape

confusable_with.deer: similar color but smaller and domestic

cat.one_line_caption: A small furry animal with pointed ears and a long tail.

deer.typical_scale: large, often fills most of frame
deer.typical_shape_and_parts: Slender body with long legs, short tail, and sometimes antlers.

confusable_with.horse: similar body shape, smaller and thinner

confusable_with.dog: four-legged and brown, but longer legs

deer.one_line_caption: A large brown animal with long legs and a slender body.

dog.typical_shape_and_parts: Four-legged body with rounded head, short snout, and tail.
dog.typical_colors_and_texture: fur in brown, black, white, mixed patterns
dog.common_viewpoints: side or front view, standing or sitting

confusable_with.cat: both furry pets, cat has pointed ears

confusable_with.deer: similar color but different size and shape

dog.one_line_caption: A four-legged furry pet animal with a rounded face.

frog.typical_shape_and_parts: Compact body with wide mouth, bulging eyes, and long hind legs.
frog.typical_colors_and_texture: green or brown, moist smooth skin
distinctive_features_to_disambiguate: sits on leaves or near water

confusable_with.bird: small animal, similar colors in greenish tone

confusable_with.cat: small body confusion at low resolution

frog.one_line_caption: A small green amphibian with smooth skin and bulging eyes.

horse.typical_shape_and_parts: Strong body with four long legs, mane, and long tail.
horse.typical_colors_and_texture: brown, black, or white, smooth short fur
horse.common_viewpoints: side view, often standing or walking

confusable_with.deer: similar body shape but thicker neck and mane

horse.one_line_caption: A large animal with long legs, a mane, and a tail.

ship.typical_scale: large, often fills most of frame
ship.typical_shape_and_parts: Elongated hull, deck, and sometimes visible sails or superstructure.
ship.typical_colors_and_texture: white, gray, blue, smooth metal or painted surface
ship.common_viewpoints: side or angled view on water
ship.motion_or_pose_cues: floating or moving across water surface

confusable_with.truck: rectangular shape may resemble hull at low detail

ship.one_line_caption: A large vessel floating or moving across the water.

truck.typical_shape_and_parts: Boxy front cab and long cargo area with multiple wheels.
truck.typical_colors_and_texture: varied solid colors, metallic smooth surface

confusable_with.ship: elongated body may resemble truck side view

truck.one_line_caption: A large road vehicle with a cab and cargo section.
